shared_secret()

returns: a HealthVault::WCData::Types::HMACAlgorithm

[Source]

    # File lib/wc_data/generated/auth/auth_session_credential.rb, line 43
43:         def shared_secret
44:           return @children['shared-secret'][:value]
45:         end
shared_secret=(value)

REQUIRED summary: The shared secret is used to authenticate all requests which include the token produced on succesful authentication. In order for a client to establish an authenticated session with the Microsoft Health Service, it must provide a shared secret. The client uses the secret as the secret key when HMAC‘ing over the header section of the request. The resulting HMAC digest forms the content of the request auth section. value is a HealthVault::WCData::Types::HMACAlgorithm

[Source]

40:         end

REQUIRED summary: The user‘s credential that will be used with the application‘s credential to create the session. value is a HealthVault::WCData::Auth::AuthSessionSubCredential
